definition: Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen
kitchen stove/kitchen
variant of 灶[zao4]
God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing
Vesta, an asteroid, second most massive object in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1807 by H.W. Olbers

sentences.english: Vesta was discovered in 1807 and immediately intrigued astronomers.
sentences.chinese: 灶神星在1807年被发现，并立即好奇的天文学家。

sentences.english: Another thing that makes Vesta planetlike is that it is split into distinct layers.
sentences.chinese: 灶神星与行星的另一个相似点是它也分裂成不同的层。

sentences.english: The belief of kitchen god is one of beliefs of the Tus.
sentences.chinese: 灶神信仰是土族群众之诸多信仰之一。

sentences.english: The story of the Kitchen God is a household Chinese fable.
sentences.chinese: “灶神”故事是中国人耳熟能详的寓言故事。

sentences.english: Ceres and Vesta will make for interesting subjects.
sentences.chinese: 谷神星和灶神星都将成为吸引人的课题。

sentences.english: Fuxi gets Wan Fu Lou back through the secret help of the Kitchen God.
sentences.chinese: 福喜在灶神的暗中帮忙下取回万福楼。

sentences.english: To the Han Dynasty, the God of Kitchen was anthropomorphized and endowed with new functions.
sentences.chinese: 到了汉代，灶神被人格化，并赋予了新的功能。

sentences.english: According to Mr. Yuan Ke, cockroach is kitchen god.
sentences.chinese: 袁珂先生曾证蟑螂是灶神，本文作支持补说。

sentences.english: Hestia, the goddess of the hearth, represented home life and family happiness.
sentences.chinese: 还有灶神赫斯提亚，代表居家生活和家庭幸福。

camel cricket/Diestrammena japonica
offering
Tudi Gong, the God of the earth
to offer sacrifices to the gods

the three gods in charge of heaven, earth and water (Daoism)
to respect a deity/to pray to a God
Marshal Zhao, aka Zhao Gongming or Zhao Xuantan, God of Wealth in the Chinese folk tradition and Taoism
blessings from heaven
head priest of a temple
